name: Tokuga Wars
description:
An Advanced wars Clone, early stage project for the Gamecodeur Gamejam #26
Student Premium at Gamecodeur since  2019 december

under love2D & LUA

Didn't manage to add some grahics of my own neither some sound or music
graphs are taken on several sites,  but will be replaced soon.

But will do after the Jam ending
I spent the time of  the videos, coding while watching.

Indeed even if I don't win, this was my first Jam and hope to finish this anyway, afterwards.
It's was a really interresting experience to do
